meanings.definition: A person who practices pictorialism in photography.
meanings.sent1: The pictorialists gathered to discuss their latest photo projects.
meanings.sent2: Many pictorialists prefer using soft focus in their photographs.
meanings.sent3: The pictorialists joked that their cameras were their paintbrushes.
meanings.sent4: Her artistic vision transformed her into a pictorialist of emotions.
meanings.sent5: The group of pictorialists captured the essence of nature in their images.

meanings.sent3: The pictorialists workshop offered tips on creating dreamy photographs.
